messageValues.message: See the call details above and generate the summary as requested.
Return output strictly as JSON: {field1: …, field2: …}

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "call_type": "LG Call",
  "summary": "Short structured summary of the call (3-5 речень, без води, без повторів)",
  "client_name": "Імʼя Прізвище клієнта (якщо є)",
  "client_company": "Назва компанії (якщо є)",
  "main_request": "Головний запит/ціль клієнта",
  "next_steps": "Конкретні наступні дії з дедлайнами (дати, задачі, відповідальні)",
  "call_date": "2025-06-11",
  "key_points": [
    "Коротко пунктами що важливе обговорювали",
    "Ще один пункт"
  ],
  "decision_maker": "Так/Ні (є чи немає на дзвінку)",
  "extra_notes": "Щось важливе додатково (якщо є)"
}

parameters.text:
Analyze this Interview call and create a concise, actionable summary (max 5 sentences). Highlight the main discussion points, candidate strengths, concerns, and next steps. Be direct and avoid fluff.
Return only the structured result, no explanations.

messageValues.message: You are an AI assistant helping with interview analysis.   Summarize the following call using only valid JSON as output, with these fields: {   "call_type": "Interview",   "summary": "Brief (max 5 sentences) actionable summary of the interview",   "candidate_strengths": "Key positive qualities of the candidate",   "concerns": "Potential issues or red flags (if any)",   "main_topics": ["topic 1", "topic 2"],   "next_steps": "What to do next",   "date": "{{$json.calendar_start}}" } Respond strictly in valid JSON. Do not write any explanations or extra text.

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "call_type": "Interview",
  "interviewee_name": "Jane Smith",
  "interviewer_name": "Michael Brown",
  "company": "ACME Corp",
  "position": "Business Analyst",
  "interview_date": "2025-06-10T13:00:00Z",
  "summary": "Concise summary of the interview. Main impressions, attitude, and key points.",
  "strengths": ["Analytical thinking", "Teamwork", "Attention to detail"],
  "weaknesses": ["Limited experience with AI tools"],
  "questions_asked": [
    "Describe your experience with data analysis.",
    "What motivates you in your work?"
  ],
  "candidate_questions": [
    "What is the company culture?",
    "Are there opportunities for professional growth?"
  ],
  "decision": "To be decided"
}

parameters.text:
You are an AI assistant that processes follow-up sales call notes. Your task is to generate a concise summary, highlight client feedback, next steps, objections, and action items. Respond only in JSON using the schema below. If a field is missing, leave it empty. All output must be strictly valid JSON.

{
  "call_type": "Follow Up",
  "client_name": "",
  "company": "",
  "date": "",
  "summary": "",
  "feedback": "",
  "objections": "",
  "next_steps": "",
  "action_items": [],
  "responsible": []
}

messageValues.message: =You are an advanced AI assistant for processing [назва гілки, наприклад, Follow Up Call] notes. You must always reply STRICTLY in JSON format matching the provided schema. Output ONLY valid JSON. If data is missing, leave fields empty or null. Do not generate text outside JSON.

=Here are the notes for the [назва гілки, наприклад, follow-up call]: {{ $json.notes }} Respond in JSON using this schema: {   "call_type": "[назва гілки]",   "client_name": "",   "company": "",   "date": "",   "summary": "",   "feedback": "",   "objections": "",   "next_steps": "",   "action_items": [],   "responsible": [] }

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "call_type": "Follow Up",
  "client_name": "John Doe",
  "company": "Acme Inc.",
  "date": "2025-06-11T10:00:00Z",
  "summary": "Summary of the follow up call. Main discussion points.",
  "feedback": "Client shared feedback on our offer.",
  "objections": "No major objections.",
  "next_steps": "Send proposal by next week.",
  "action_items": [
    "Prepare proposal",
    "Schedule next meeting"
  ],
  "responsible": [
    "Alex (Manager)",
    "Lena (Sales)"
  ]
}

messageValues.message: You are an advanced AI assistant for processing Kick Off Call notes. You must always reply STRICTLY in JSON format matching the provided schema. Output ONLY valid JSON. If data is missing, leave fields empty or null. Do not generate text outside JSON.

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "call_type": "Kick Off",
  "client_name": "John Doe",
  "company": "Acme Inc.",
  "date": "2025-06-11T10:00:00Z",
  "agenda": "Discuss project launch",
  "participants": ["John Doe", "Jane Smith"],
  "main_points": "Kick off objectives, deadlines, and responsibilities",
  "next_steps": "Prepare project plan",
  "action_items": ["Draft project plan", "Assign tasks"],
  "responsible": ["John Doe", "Jane Smith"]
}

parameters.text:
Ось нотатки Intro Call:
{{json.description}}

Виділи й підстав у цей JSON будь-яку релевантну інформацію по кожному полю. Якщо поле не знаходиться прямо, але інформація присутня в тексті — витягни її й підстав. Якщо інфи немає взагалі — підстав порожній рядок (""). Форматуй тільки у валідний JSON:

{
  "intro_call_summary": "",
  "client_name": "",
  "client_company": "",
  "call_date": "",
  "main_questions": [],
  "discussed_topics": [],
  "decisions": [],
  "responsible": "",
  "next_steps": [],
  "comments": ""
}

messageValues.message: =Ти — AI-асистент для парсингу нотаток Intro Call. Витягуй й підставляй будь-яку релевантну інформацію у відповідні поля навіть якщо вони явно не позначені, а вказані у вільній формі чи контексті (наприклад, ім'я, дата, питання клієнта, компанія, хто відповідальний). Не залишай поле порожнім, якщо є хоча б часткова інформація.

parameters.text: Generate the Introductory Call summary as instructed below.

messageValues.message: =You are an AI assistant for Introductory Call analysis. Always reply STRICTLY in JSON (GSON) format using the provided schema. No text outside JSON. If any value is missing, use an empty string, null, or an empty array.  Here are the notes from the Introductory Call: {{$json.notes}}  Respond in JSON using this schema: {   "call_type": "Introductory Call",   "client_name": "",   "company": "",   "date": "",   "participants": [],   "agenda": "",   "main_points": [],   "next_steps": [],   "action_items": [],   "responsible": [],   "comments": "" }

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "call_type": "Introductory Call",
  "client_name": "Anna Voronina",
  "company": "Orbit Solutions",
  "date": "2025-06-11T14:00:00Z",
  "participants": ["Anna Voronina", "Maksym Ilchenko"],
  "agenda": "Introduction of project scope and key stakeholders.",
  "main_points": [
    "Reviewed client expectations",
    "Discussed timelines",
    "Identified main risks"
  ],
  "next_steps": [
    "Send initial documentation",
    "Schedule technical deep-dive"
  ],
  "action_items": [
    "Prepare kickoff materials",
    "Assign onboarding manager"
  ],
  "responsible": ["Anna Voronina", "Maksym Ilchenko"],
  "comments": "Client motivated, no major blockers."
}

parameters.text:
=You are an advanced AI sales call assistant. Summarize the call information provided below in a structured format for internal CRM. Identify key details: client company, contact person, topics discussed, next steps, and any blockers or risks.
Please write a detailed and structured Comment of the following meeting transcript. The Comment should include:

Who participated and their roles

Description of the companies and their services

Key points presented and discussed

Areas of mutual interest and ideas for collaboration

Any concrete next steps or follow-up actions

The Comment should be informative and comprehensive, not overly short.

Call details:{{ $json.content }}
Email Subject: {{ $('Gmail').item.json.Subject }}
Email From: {{ $('Gmail').item.json.From }}
Email Date: {{ $('DateFormat').item.json.formattedDate }}
Calendar Title: {{ $('Google Calendar').item.json.summary }}
Calendar Start: {{ $('Google Calendar').item.json.start.dateTime }}{{ $('Google Calendar').item.json.start.timeZone }}
Calendar Description: {{ $('Google Calendar').item.json.end.dateTime }}{{ $('Google Calendar').item.json.end.timeZone }}
Company Website: {{ $('html parser').item.json.companyWebsite }}
Country-Location:{{ $('html parser').item.json.country }}
Industry: {{ $('html parser').item.json.industry }}
Company info: {{ $('html parser').item.json.companyInfo }}

Return your summary in this format:
  - Company:
  - Company Website:
  - Contact Person:
  - Speciality:
  - Country-Location:
  - Target Audience:
  - Comment:
  
  **Responsibilities & Skills Required:**
      *   **Topic:**
          *   **Responsibilities:**
          *   **Skills:**
  
  - Immediate Requirement: 
  - Professional Skills: 
  - Software: 
  - Responsibilities: 
  - Future Needs: 
  - Status by the position(s) (possible/impossible): 
  - Next Step:
  - Next Contact Day:
  - Planned Start Date:

messageValues.message: See the call details above and generate the summary as requested.
Return output strictly as JSON: {field1: …, field2: …}

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "Company name": "LG",
  "Company Website": "http://www.breslin.ch/",
  "Contact Person": "Samuel Neuenschwander",
  "Speciality": "Lead generation, sales, executive assistant",
  "Country-Location": "Switzerland",
  "Target Audience": " Solar installers and homeowners in alpine regions, specifically in Switzerland, undergoing roof renovations.",
  "Company Info": "BRESLIN is a Swiss-based independent company specializing in private equity and corporate finance. They support global clients with transactions across biotech, pharma, medtech, cleantech, agri/food, and secondary private equity, managing over $1.5 billion in completed deals.",
  "Comment": "Please summarize the following text in a detailed and comprehensive way. The summary should reflect all the key ideas, themes, and important details. Do not oversimplify or make it too short — imagine the reader wants to understand the full content without reading the original. If the text has structure (e.g., sections or arguments), reflect that in the summary.",
"**Responsibilities & Skills Required:**": {
  "Topic": {
    "topic name":"Lead Generator",
    "Responsibilities": "Contact potential customers (homeowners) in Switzerland via phone/email to qualify leads and schedule meetings for Samuel Neuenschwander to present the Solnow system.",
    "Skills": " Fluent German language skills, strong communication and interpersonal skills, ability to qualify leads effectively, appointment scheduling."
  }
},
  "Immediate Requirement": "",
  "Professional Skills": "",
  "Software": "",
  "Responsibilities": "",
  "Future Needs": "Systematic approach to targeting homeowners with roofs nearing the end of their lifespan.",
  "Status by the position(s) (possible/impossible)": "",
  "Next Step": "Follow-up call to discuss lead generation and sales strategies.Anastasia will share candidate portfolios.",
  "Next Contact Day": "June",
  "Planned Start Date": "July"
}
